comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT OF September 19, 1970 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F7061FFA3B5C117B... indicates that Picabia was in New York at the time of the Armory Show in 1913. Perhaps this was taken at the show, since it has 1913 written on the negative. xroads.virginia.edu/~MUSEUM/Armory/galleryI/galleryi.7.html is part of an attempt to reproduce the show. However, its painting with the same name xroads.virginia.edu/~MUSEUM/Armory/galleryI/picabia.416.html is not identical.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Feb 16, 1913 has a piece in Picabia with several photos of works. See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9D04E0D81539E632A... The picture at the lower right-hand side of the article appears to be this one.
